title: @Riot DJ Sona music icon is off the new HUD

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Have you checked out the [How-to](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/0AQTKJI1-updated-for-new-hud-how-to-opting-in-to-dj-sonas-music) thread? It's been updated to reflect the new HUD.
talking about new HUD problems, have you seen khazix evolutions? it looks exactly like spell lvl up... so u can easily accidentaly evolne sth u dont want to, bcs u mistook it for spell point...
